add_custom_target(rust_out_of_tree3 ALL
  COMMAND KERNEL_BUILD=${KBIN_ROOT} KERNEL_SOURCE=${KDIR_ROOT} $(MAKE) -C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
  WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)

add_custom_target(rust_out_of_tree3_clean
  COMMAND KERNEL_BUILD=${KBIN_ROOT} KERNEL_SOURCE=${KDIR_ROOT} $(MAKE) -C ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} clean
  WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)
